title: my 4a5g won't download over phone data. says its waiting for wifi but settings are right.
content: my phone wont download apps in play store on cell network.  waits for wifi, yes I have full LTE service, yes I have wifi turned off, yes I have data saver turned off, yes I have play store app settings right.  I have the network, data, and app settings all correct and it still won't download app and still says waiting for wifi.  I restarted phone after changing permissions, settings, etc and still didnt work, checked to see if settings were what I changed them to and they were.
